frontmatter.title: Performance of meaning
frontmatter.description: interactive installation assisting users to draw abstract artworks

projectData.task: To reflect on the relationship between reflexivity and contingency by creating a generative algorithm producing pleasing abstract works and exhibit it.
projectData.whyExists: The project uses generative algorithm written in p5.js that defines color palettes, shapes and direction of their movement for each time the program runs. An installation lets visitors create their own artworks like these.

process.title: Coding
process.caption: I decided to teach myself to code and iterated a lot until got something interesting

process.title: Printing
process.caption: After generating 100s of images, I selected 9, printed and framed them

process.title: Exhibition
process.caption: With the venue owner, we mounted the pieces and the installation

details.title: Prototype
details.text: The image generation follows user's gesture (or mouse). You can try it yourself!

images.caption: I also designed a custom cup for the time of exhibition

projectData.results: Solo exhibiton at Prosvet Coffee in Moscow from January to April 2022. 2/9 pieces sold.
